item.title: An options strategy that bets on this medical device stock catching up to the rest of the market

item.title: Another mark-moving AI chip deal: Reason to buy or is this just more 'money going in a circle'?

item.title: Mike Novogratz's Galaxy Digital jumps 10% after launching retail trading app to compete against Robinhood
item.description: Galaxy Digital introduced a commission-free trading platform, Galaxy One, on Monday that offers similar services to rival Robinhood.

item.title: Goldman Sachs lifts Nvidia price target, says chipmaker's partnerships will drive more gains
